      • inference

        public static java.util.List<ValueTriple> inference(elvira.Bnet bnet,
                                                    elvira.Evidence ev,
                                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> queryItemIds,
                                                    double minRating,
                                                    double referredRatingValue,
                                                    RatingFilter ratingFilter)
        Making inference on given Bayesian network and evidence.
        Parameters:
        bnet - given Bayesian network
        ev - given evidence.
        queryItemIds - list of queried item identifiers.
        minRating - minimum rating.
        referredRatingValue - referred rating value, often relevant value = (minimum value + maximum value)/2.
        ratingFilter - rating filter.
        Returns:
        list of ValueTriple as reference result.

      • inference

        Parameters:

        ev - given evidence.
        queryItemList - pair list of queried item identifiers.
        minRating - minimum rating value.
        Returns:
        list of ValueTriple as reference result.
